channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @JNathan @infination @MrChuckD @Rosenbergradio @adamcurry This is a better piece. https://t.co/4Oi6yCZKUe
@KnicksNation My positive feelings for the Knicks would be swamped by disgust of kyrie.
The insurrection won't end until Trump is prosecuted. https://t.co/7L15UIFnl7
As Colorado River reservoirs drop, states urged to 'act now.' https://t.co/6AcCgrpTpR
If you're looking for baseball news, I have your site. https://t.co/TdnU89Chp6
sarcasm sucks because you'd better be right and more often than not the sarcastichole is wrong.
@peterdelevett @GwashburnGlobe lebron is probably available.
@Scobleizer @siegel @bbedit zuck was lucky.

@siegel @Scobleizer @bbedit that's right, nor did he have any idea that webstar or frontier existed. i think he seriously thought he was bringing the mac up to speed in internet stuff. all seat of the pants. bbedit wasn't in the way because there was no unix editor like yours. and good for you bro.
@siegel @Scobleizer @bbedit i'm not really complaining (that much). we went on to do all kinds of stuff that he could have benefited from, instead fuck him. ðŸ˜€

@Scobleizer @bbedit hey i'm still alive. so there's that. ;-)
@Scobleizer @bbedit knock wood.
@ScruggsDJ @TaylorLorenz @jeffjarvis @mattyglesias i hate sarcasm
SUV drives into Sunflower Market in Woodstock. https://t.co/tsIbFmnXjc
@cvoxel Thanks for doing this. I added a link to your PDF at the bottom of the https://t.co/EQXyzynAnM page. https://t.co/vlTAlfufn0
@jeffjarvis @mattyglesias really
@nakedjen Bull shit. ðŸ˜€
The next NBA dream team... https://t.co/WNAO7cSQfN
Covid Cases Surge But Deaths Stay Near Lows. https://t.co/RX0H488C2N
@davetroy there's one way to find out! ;-)
I still think we should offer Trump $1 billion cash if he agrees to leave the United States, forever. It would be a bargain.

Why do the Nets want Kyrie. They already have a crybaby with Ben Simmons. Kyrie is a proven loser. The Nets were swept in the first round and they say hoh that was good give us more of that good shit. https://t.co/LdwkDWosQV
@jeffjarvis @Malinowski i like this idea, a campaign for each republican positioning them as cowards. all they have to do is pop their heads up, and we run ads about how they suck.
@AriMelber He sent all those people to the Capitol to terrorize the legislature and the country. His intent was very clear about that. Why isn't that sufficient?
The Knicks could probably get Kristaps for pennies on the dollar?

As @GeorgeLakoff says -- I vote values not self-interest. I don't need a lot of the services I think the govt should fund. I have my education but I think we should spend more on that. Same with making sure people have enough to eat and a place to live. https://t.co/jFEMCquBGT
I don't believe in heaven and hell, and i don't think it's our place to judge others. If we can afford to make sure everyone is provided for, we should do it, and quit worrying about whether someone got more help than you. They didn't. And who cares.
the problem is a lot of *really* rich people only vote their supposed self-interest. they're making a mistake. they don't need any help from the government. they should enjoy their wealth and stop worrying about what poor people do. they aren't gods. not immortal or omniscient.
